name: Boston to Paris - Starlink Handover
description:
Boston <-> Paris via Starlink constellation
72 orbits à 22 satellites = 1584 satellites, 550km height, 53° orbit inclination, 4 ISL links
100 ground stations with 10,000 background traffic flows
50Mbps GSL and ISL link capacities
Extra Feature: 1000ms packet loss during handover
